text: It seemed to the frightened judge as though his son would actually shoot the craft in time dropping the small sheet of wet canvas. Bill cleared the corner of the pier by inches, and with the tiller still hard over, brought the yawl up against the waves with left hand a cowboy loop in right, to toss the loop over one of the piles that projected upward for about three feet, from the lee side of the pier.
handwritten_text: It seemed to the frightened judge as though his son would actually shoot the craft in time dropping the small sheet of wet canvas. Bill cleared the corner of the pier by inches, and with the tiller still hard over, brought the yawl up against the waves with left hand a cowboy loop in right, to toss the loop over one of the piles that projected upward for about three feet, from the lee side of the pier.
